feedback.Physical Object: Included — A discrete and tangible mechanical housing with moving parts.
feedback.Synthetic: Included — Crafted by humans using industrial or artisanal methods.
feedback.Biological/Biomimetic: Excluded — Not inspired by or derived from biological forms.
feedback.Powered: Included — Requires wound spring, gravity, or kinetic energy input.
feedback.Structural: Included — Rigid framework of gears, shafts, and supports.
feedback.Observable: Included — Movement and dial are perceptible to human senses.
feedback.Physical Medium: Included — Built from tangible materials (wood, brass, glass, etc.).
feedback.Intentionally Designed: Included — Engineered specifically to keep and display time.
feedback.Outputs Effect: Included — Emits structured output (time display, ticking, chimes).
feedback.Processes Signals/Logic: Included — Regulates motion via mechanical logic (escapement, ratios).
feedback.State-Transforming: Included — Advances its internal state in relation to time passage.
feedback.Human-Interactive: Included — Set, adjusted, and wound by human users.
feedback.System-integrated: Excluded — Typically self-contained, not embedded in larger functional networks.
feedback.System-Essential: Excluded — Not required as a component within another system.
feedback.Signalling: Included — Communicates structured temporal information via dials or sound.
feedback.Rule-governed: Included — Operates under fixed, formal physical rules.
feedback.Temporal: Included — Identity and purpose are defined entirely by timekeeping.
feedback.Symbolic: Excluded — May have symbolic meaning contextually, but not intrinsically.
feedback.Compositional: Excluded — Not composed of abstract modular subunits.
feedback.Economically Significant: Included — Historically foundational to industrial and maritime systems; still valuable in luxury and precision timekeeping markets.
feedback.Politicised: Excluded — Not involved in political discourse or regulation.
feedback.Ritualised: Excluded — Not part of ceremonial practice in its basic form.
feedback.Ethically Significant: Excluded — Not morally charged in production or use.
feedback.Social Construct: Excluded — Exists as a physical object regardless of cultural framing.
feedback.Institutionally Defined: Excluded — Not defined by regulation or classification.
feedback.Identity-Linked: Excluded — Not inherently associated with roles or status.
feedback.Regulated: Excluded — No intrinsic legal or institutional restrictions.

encoding_notes: This encoding captures the mechanical clock as a powered, autonomous, rule-based timekeeping system with historical and present-day economic significance. Symbolic or ritual traits are excluded. Final UHT code: DFFD6208.
